976370.name: Terminal Conflict: Supreme Commander Upgrade Pack
976370.description:
This pack will upgrade your Terminal Conflict Commander in Chief Edition to the Supreme Commander Edition, which will provide you with the following content*:

Supreme Commander Terminal (cosmetic):

Set in deep dark metallic tones, a dark terminal for the dark minded. Treat yourself, for that feel of ultimate power. The manufacturer guarantees that it's quality non-stick surface requires no cleaning or maintenance.

Special Achievement (cosmetic):

Supreme Commander Steam Achievement unlocked.

Unique American Polices:

Three US policies in your home theater of North America that can be uniquely enacted.

Unique Soviet Polices:

Three USSR policies in your home theater of Eastern Europe that can be uniquely enacted.

Decisions:

Five new decisions that create unique opportunities.


*Extra content does not provide you an advantage in Multiplayer. When connecting to a player with a higher tier DLC the game for both players will always play the highest DLCs available.
976370.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
